item.title: Arch Linux post installation
item.description: Update your system 1 # pacman -Syu Install X server, Desktop Environment and Display Manager 1 # pacman -S xorg To install GNOME: 1 # pacman -S gnome gnome-extra To install Cinnamon: 1 # pacman -S cinnamon nemo-file-roller To install XFCE: 1 # pacman -S xfce4 xfce4-goodies To install KDE: 1 # pacman -S plasma To install MATE:
